title: Ticket #2042: param table has defaults for some GSI settings that should be empty
description:
the param table has default entries for GSI_DAEMON_DIRECTORY, GSI_DAEMON_TRUSTED_CA_DIR, and GRIDMAP. this is wrong, and causes bad behavior in at least the following scenario:

  1. nothing installed in /etc/grid-security
  2. GSI_DAEMON_DIRECTORY and GSI_DAEMON_TRUSTED_CA_DIR are not defined in the condor_config
  3. submit file has x509userproxy defined

submit then fails because the proxy cannot be validated since gsi will be looking in the wrong place instead of honoring appropriate environment variables.
